analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Naajjhattārammaṇaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā ajjhattārammaṇo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha …pe… avigate cha.
analyzed: na ajjhatta ārammaṇam na kusalam dhammam paccayā ajjhatta ārammaṇaḥ kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā cha pe avigate cha
